content.rendered:
Dynamic Merchant Solutions Offers The
Best Merchant Services In Los Angeles.

Accept payments in-store and online with the top merchant services provider in Los Angeles.
Get Quote
Contact Sales

Our banking and technology partners 

Accept Credit Cards Anywhere

Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers a full spectrum of services for all types of businesses. From home based businesses to multi-level corporations, Dynamic Merchant Solutions can build a custom solution to fit your needs.

01 

Point of Sale Systems

Streamline operations and boost profitability with a reliable POS system that suits your needs.  

02

Credit Card Machines

Gain extra security for in-person transactions with our EMV credit card machines.

03

Ordering App

Start building relationships with your customers with your own mobile ordering app.

04

Reporting

Get real-time insights with detailed report at your fingertips, anytime of the day.

Top Merchant Processing Services Los Angeles.

How do you know which credit card processor is the best in L.A.? Dynamic Merchant Solutions
is more than just low rates. We also offer 24/7 customer support with a real person,
fraud protection, discounted marketing support, and more. We’re here to see you succeed.
  • No Application or Setup Fees
  • No Hidden Fees
  • 24/7 Customer Service with a Real Person
  • Fraud Protection
  • Chargeback Protection
  • Marketing Services
Contact Sales
Get Pricing
01 02

Get the Best Merchant Services Company Los Angeles.

Merchant Services in
Los Angeles

Whether you are processing payments in-store, online, or keyed in a virtual terminal, you’ll get
the best rates with Dynamic Merchant Solutions.
Get Your Custom Rate
No application or setup fees
No hidden fees

No monthly fees

Best Merchant Processing Services In Los Angeles.

Our banking and technology partners

Industires We Serve

We provide merchant processing services in Los Angeles for any industry,
from restaurants to retail, from eCommerce to cannabis.

Retail

From POS systems to virtual terminals, we have the solution for your retail business.

Read More

Restaurant

Get the right payment solution for your restaurant, including payment processing, menu management, and more.

Read More

Food Truck

Get the perfect POS system for your mobile food truck, taking all major payments from anywhere.

Read More

E-commerce

Get an online payment system that’s dynamic and efficient, improving your sales and profits.

Read More

Service / Repair

Our payment systems will make it easy for you to get paid no matter where you are.
Read More

Other Industries

From health care to entertainment, our flexible payment solutions make it easy for you to accept payments.
Read More

Transform your business idea into a custom mobile app.

Let our experts create a mobile app specifically for your business and start selling directly to your customers

01 02

What Our Clients Say
About Dynamic Merchant Solution.

We’re a leading merchant services company in Los Angeles

Founder - The Mart Group
